question:
A friend is expecting you to stay with him in two weeks’ time, but 
unfortunately you forgot that you have a business trip at the same time. Write a letter to your friend.


In your letter,


apologise and say that you cannot come to visit
explain why you will not be able to visit
suggest another time that you could visit


You should write at least 150 words.


You do NOT need to write any addresses. Begin your letter as follows
text: I hope this letter finds you well at home. I am writing this letter to say  sorry for not coming to your place this time.
I know you are not going to like this, but believe me, I am more disappointed than you. I had made several plans for this visit and they are all ruined now. I am extremely sorry for cancelling this.

Actually, the reason for not coming up this time is, that the day we had decided for me to stay at your accommodation is clashing with my business trip. I forgot to tell you about this tour which was supposed to happen next month was rescheduled and it is on the same day that I needed to reach your home. Since you know that this is essential for my venture and my foreign partners have already booked their tickets for this. Due to this, I have no choice but to miss our meeting.

Nevertheless, I assure you, as soon as, I come back from it my first priority will be our meeting .You will be glad to know that next month I will come to your place not for just one day but rather for three days to compensate this cancellation.
